title: GARBAGE RANKING
body:
What do you mean Riot...? 

I got SIlver V in flex queue promotional games the first time before you made this '1 more game to get an actual ranking' bullshit. 
I won 7 out of 10 games and got A-, A+, As and Ss in all of them.
NOW I PLAY THIS '1 GAME' I WIN, I GET AN S AND I GET BRONZE 1!!!
RIOT WHAT IS THIS GARBAGE!
MY MMR IS SILVER V AND I WASS HAPPY WITH MY ORIGINAL RANK!

THANKS RIOT FOR MAKING MY LIFE A NIGHT MARE! :)

The initial placements were inaccurate for damn near everyone, you included, and matchmaking was so broken that those games were compeltely useless for determining skill, hence the need for a fix. They did it in the least painful way possible. 

For an S4 ending rank (remember we're ignoring those initial flex games) a B1 placement is actually better than what a lot of people get (it's only two divs).
so you are saying if I was in the same game as him got s- and then received bronze 5 that is accurate?
It has nothing to do with mastery grades, and everything to do with what rank you ended last season with.
